stanza.line: Ah wherefore with infection should he livelive
And with his presence grace impietyimpiety
That sin by him advantage should achieveachieve
And lace it self with his societysociety
Why should false painting imitate his cheekcheek
And steal dead seeming of his living huehue
Why should poor beauty indirectly seekseek
Roses of shadow since his rose is truetrue
Why should he live now nature bankrupt isis
Beggared of blood to blush through lively veinsveins
For she hath no exchequer now but hishis
And proud of many lives upon his gainsgains
O him she stores to show what wealth she hadhad
In days long since before these last so badbad
